free: #n 死 --> 打: 可理解，但有點怪怪的。應該是先打再死
#e Tanebake already hit and killed Kui.
#c Tanebake 打 (Kui) 然後(打)死了 Kui
#n Semantic anomaly caused by sequential event violation
#e Tanebake will hit and kill Kui
#n madalame-nga 的 'nga' 沒有加重語調時，為 aspectual marker.
#n 當 madalame-nga 的 'nga' 有加重語調時，表示「強調」，非 aspect marker
#n 錯誤句子。'alupu-nga' 的 'nga' 無法確定被分析為 aspect marker 還是強調，因為兩種分析都不合理。若為
#c 這些學生來 (這裡) 學習
#n 「學習 --> 教」違反 sequential action，所以語意理解上怪怪的。但勉強可理解
#e These students had come here to learn.
#c 這些學生來 (這裡) 學習了
#e These students will come to learn.
#c 這些學生會來 (這裡) 學習
#e At noon, the rain will stop.
#n kay udale 可移到最前面
#e I leave to play at work.
#c  我工作的時候離開(去)玩
#e I sneakly leave to play at work.
#e Muni pick up the wood and then burn it.
#e Lavurase bought clothes and then give them to Kui.
#e Lavurase hunt his wife a boar
#c Lavurase 獵給他的太太一隻山豬
#e I take the knife and then cut the female pig’s male.
#c 我拿菜刀然後切母山豬的肉
#e I chop wood with this axe.
#e I try to learn to cook
#e Tanebake was scold by his father (and) then he cried.
#e Kui fell over and his leg broken.

gloss: [ngia-生病-重疊-生病].假裝生病-我.主格
free: #e I don’t want to go to school, so I pretend to be sick.
#c 我不想去學校，然後我假裝生病
#e Kui is very sick for a long time.
#e Kui is very sick for a long time.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#c 明天 Kui 會病得很重
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#c 明天 Kui 會病得很重
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be sick seriouly.
#c 明天 Kui 會病得很嚴重
#n 傷 --> 打: 可理解，但有點怪怪的。應該是先打再傷
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#c Tanebake 已經打傷 Kui 了
#n 和 #13 語意略為不同。此為已經「打」了
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#c Tanebake 已經打傷 Kui 了
#n 和 #12 語意略為不同。此為已經「傷」了
#e Tomorrow, Tanebake will hit (and) hurt Kui
#c 明天 Tanebake 會打傷 Kui
#e Tomorrow, Tanebake will hit (and) hurt Kui
#c 明天 Tanebake 會打傷 Kui
#n 違反先「打」再「傷」的順序，所以怪怪的，但勉強可理解
#n 語意上怪怪的。傾向用其他方式表達。
#n nga 有加重語調，有「強調」意味，非 aspect marker。
#e (If sick, ) Kui will hate to eat rice.
#c (如果生病，) Kui 會討厭吃飯
#e Kui does not want to eat.
#e (After learning to hunt for some time, ) Kui is able to hunt.
#c (經過一段時間的學習) Kui 會打獵了
#e Kui is able to hunt (long time ago)
#e Next year, Kui will be able to hunt.
#c 明年 Kui 就會打獵了
#e Next year, Kui will be better at hunting.
#c 明年，Kui 就更會打獵了
#e These students go to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#c 這些學生去前面被老師打
#e These student alreay went to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#c 這些學生已經到台上被老師打了
#e These student alreay went to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#c 這些學生已經到台上被老師打了
#e These student will go to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#c 這些學生將到台上被老師打了
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#c Tanebake 已經打傷 Kui 了
#n Strangeness resulting from violation of sequential order.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#c 明天 Kui 會病得很重
#e Tanebake have already hit and hurt Kui.
#c Tanebake 已經打傷 Kui 了
#n 和 #12 語意略為不同。此為已經「傷」了
#e I want to go to school.
#e Muni wants to go to school.
#e I don't want to borrow your knife.
#e Muni doesn't want to borrow your knife.
#n 錯誤句子。apia 應該是 affix
#e I might not go to Taipei
#e I will not go to Taipei.
#e I will not go to Taipei.
#n malrase 用在人身上是指「不喜歡」，非「討厭」

gloss: [被動-實現-重疊.正在-_].開心-我.主格
[被動-實現-重疊.正在-_].開心-我.主格

free: #n matia 應該是動詞，因為 kiraragay 沒有 RLS marker. 但 matia 也不需 aku 連接，即可表示我
#e (Seeing Muni makes me happy). (lit: Muni (deixis), (I) feel happy.
#n matia 需更多測試：是否可表示自己以外之人的 modal?
#e I want to borrow your knife.

free: #e At noon, it will not rain.

#e At noon, it will not rain.

#e It will not rain again tomorrow.
#n ‘-nga’ mark the event as a whole.
#e I want to borrow your knife.
#c 我想要借你的刀 (lit: 我的心想借你的刀)
#e My father was good at hunting when (he is) a kid.
#c 我爸爸小時候很會打獵
#e My father is good at hunting.
#c 我常嘲笑 Lavurase (lit: 我專門嘲笑 Lavurase)
#e Kui was mad and chopped the wood.
#c Kui 生氣地去砍柴 (lit: Kui 邊生氣邊砍柴)
#e Kui is mad at the wood.
#e Tomorrow I want to go to Taipei.
#e This kid often steal. (lit: This kid is professional at stealing)
#c 這小孩常偷東西 (lit: 這小孩是專業偷東西)
#e This kid stole things last year.
#e This kid often steal things last year.
#c 這小孩去年常偷東西 (lit: 去年,  這小孩是專業偷東西)

free: #e I will often go to Taipei
#e Next year, I will sometimes go to Taipei

gloss: 主格-實現-重疊-重疊-下雨

free: #e I started to learn Rukai last year.
#c 我去年開始學習魯凱語

gloss: 主焦-實現-下雨-重疊-下雨
free: #e (Because) it rain, then we stop hunting.
#c (因為)下雨，然後我們停止打獵了
#e I want to borrow your knife.
#e Kui sneakly left the house (and) went to Taipei.
#c Kui 偷偷地離開房子去台北
#e I use the knife to kill Muni.
#e Tanebake used the knife to kill Muni.
#c Kui 的病很嚴重 (lit: 病很嚴重，這 Kui)
#n agili 不特定表示弟弟或妹妹。ku 比 ka 常用。
#n ku ababay ku agili 指妹妹
#n ku sauvalay ku agili 指弟弟
#c 這個 Laucu 有很多哥哥姊姊
#n takalra 很多人；makalra 很多東西。takalra 比 makalra 更多。
#c 那個 Laucu 沒有姊姊
#n 魯凱語沒有「他」，會直接說出對方名字，較為禮貌
#e Ms. Legeane, don’t you have younger siblings?
#c Legeane 老師，你有弟弟妹妹嗎?
#n 魯凱語用語調區分問句及一般句子，agi 的 /i/ 在唸時通常會 drop
#e Ms. Legeane, don’t you have younger sisters?
#e Ms. Legeane, don’t you have younger sisters?
#e Is that Elrenge your younger sister?
#c 那個 Elrenge 是你的妹妹嗎?
#n 因為 Elrenge 是女子名，故將 agili 解釋成「我的妹妹」。
#c 那個 Labausu 是我的妹妹
#n 因為 Labausu 是女子名，故將 agili 解釋成「我的妹妹」
#e Is that Elrenge your older sister?
#c 那個 Elrenge 是你的姊姊嗎?
#n 因為 Elrenge 是女子名，故將 takasu 解釋成「我的姊姊」
#n -nga 表已經完成跳舞；wadralray 祭典的傳統舞；waudulri 一般的舞
#n duase 也是離開，但少用。ma 表示有走了
#e The house has been completely broken.
#e This Lavurase is demolishing the house.
#n 如果沒有特別標明 (例如：tacebeane)，就是指整個人很好
#e The food is good for the body.
#n Elrenge 是女子名，不須額外標註 ababay
#n 族語老師認為這句沒有第 32 句來得順
